text: Club Atlético Bembibre is a Spanish football team based in Bembibre, León province, in the autonomous community of Castile and León. Founded in 1922, it plays in Tercera División – Group 8, holding home games at Estadio La Devesa, with a capacity of 2,750 seats. == History == Atlético Bembibre was founded in 1922.
